thread.title: Factory Motor Parts Expands Auto Parts Distribution Network to the Eastern U.S.

author: cnbc.com
title: Factory Motor Parts Expands Auto Parts Distribution Network to the Eastern U.S.
text:
EAGAN, Minn., March 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Factory Motor Parts (FMP), a leading independent automotive aftermarket company based in Eagan, Minn., is expanding its parts distribution footprint to the states of Connecticut, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, and North Carolina. The company announces the acquisition of Connecticut Warehouse Distributors in New England, the Jack Young Company of Boston, and Auto Supply Company in North Carolina.
For more than 72 years, FMP has been a premier supplier of parts and service to automotive professionals throughout the US, as well as in China and the Middle East through its international operations. FMP distributes high quality brands like FVP, SPLASH, and other leading OE and aftermarket brands.
FPM strives to understand each customer's needs and expectations. The company's goal is to not only be a great parts supplier, but to be a trusted business partner and a major contributor to each customer's business success.
For More Information, Contact:
Todd Heldt
Executive Vice President
Factory Motor Parts
Office: 651-405-7701
Cell: 651-334-5179
